oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Burning of the Steamer "Golden City"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; steamboats; Mississippi River; 1880s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Buring of the Steamer 'Golden City' at Memphis." Appears along with eight other images in the Harper's Weekly from April 18, 1882.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Graham, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
